languages.text: {n}Вы мысленно отдаете сущности приказ — покинуть судно, затаиться на шаттле и, как только он вернется на борт, проникнуть в системы вашего корабля. Демон, стоявший за осквернением погибшего или обезумевшего экипажа, теперь будет верно служить вам.{/n}

{n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы мысленно отдаете сущности приказ — покинуть судно, затаиться на шаттле и, как только он вернется на борт, проникнуть в системы вашего корабля. Демон, стоявший за осквернением погибшего или обезумевшего экипажа, теперь будет верно служить вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}

{n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}

{n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}

{n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous ordonnez mentalement à l'entité de quitter son réceptacle, d'embarquer sur la navette et de s'infiltrer dans les systèmes du vaisseau dès son arrivée à bord. Le démon profanateur responsable de la folie des membres de l'équipage est désormais entièrement à votre service.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ordonnez mentalement à l'entité de quitter son réceptacle, d'embarquer sur la navette et de s'infiltrer dans les systèmes du vaisseau dès son arrivée à bord. Le démon profanateur responsable de la folie des membres de l'équipage est désormais entièrement à votre service.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ordenas mentalmente al ser que abandone la nave, se esconda en la lanzadera y, en cuanto vuelva a tu nave, se infiltre en los sistemas. El daemon responsable de la profanación de los tripulantes muertos o enloquecidos te servirá fielmente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenas mentalmente al ser que abandone la nave, se esconda en la lanzadera y, en cuanto vuelva a tu nave, se infiltre en los sistemas. El daemon responsable de la profanación de los tripulantes muertos o enloquecidos te servirá fielmente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その存在に、船から出てシャトルで密航し、シャトルが船に戻ったらすぐに船のシステムに侵入するよう意識的に命令する。死者や狂った乗組員を冒涜したディーモンが忠実な従者となった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その存在に、船から出てシャトルで密航し、シャトルが船に戻ったらすぐに船のシステムに侵入するよう意識的に命令する。死者や狂った乗組員を冒涜したディーモンが忠実な従者となった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你通过精神力量，命令这个实体离开这艘飞船，偷偷潜入到你的穿梭机上。当穿梭机返回你的飞船时，你要求它渗透到飞船的系统之中。这只恶魔曾杀害、逼疯了无数船员，如今它成为了你忠实的仆从。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你通过精神力量，命令这个实体离开这艘飞船，偷偷潜入到你的穿梭机上。当穿梭机返回你的飞船时，你要求它渗透到飞船的系统之中。这只恶魔曾杀害、逼疯了无数船员，如今它成为了你忠实的仆从。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du befiehlst der Wesenheit mental, sich auf das Shuttle zu schmuggeln und nach der Rückkehr des Shuttles zu deinem Schiff dessen Systeme zu infiltrieren. Der für die Schändung der toten oder wahnsinnigen Crew verantwortliche Dämon ist dir nun treu ergeben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du befiehlst der Wesenheit mental, sich auf das Shuttle zu schmuggeln und nach der Rückkehr des Shuttles zu deinem Schiff dessen Systeme zu infiltrieren. Der für die Schändung der toten oder wahnsinnigen Crew verantwortliche Dämon ist dir nun treu ergeben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaratığa akıl yoluyla gemiden ayrılmasını, mekiğe saklanmasını ve mekik gemine döner dönmez geminin sistemlerine sızmasını emrediyorsun. Ölen ve aklını kaçıran tayfayla oyun oynayan iblis, artık senin sadık bir hizmetkârın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You mentally order the entity to leave the vessel, stow away on the shuttle, and, as soon as the shuttle returns to your ship, infiltrate the ship's systems. The daemon responsible for the desecration of the dead or deranged crew will now faithfully serve you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaratığa akıl yoluyla gemiden ayrılmasını, mekiğe saklanmasını ve mekik gemine döner dönmez geminin sistemlerine sızmasını emrediyorsun. Ölen ve aklını kaçıran tayfayla oyun oynayan iblis, artık senin sadık bir hizmetkârın.{/n}
